tool.name: OGS: AddLayer
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'AddLayer'.

param.name: output_mesh_file
param.label: output mesh file
param.help: the file the mesh should be written to (vtu format)

param.name: layer_tickness
param.label: layer tickness
param.help: the thickness of the new layer

param.name: add_layer_on_bottom
param.label: add layer on bottom
param.help: Per default the layer is add on the top, if this argument is set the layer is add on the bottom.

param.name: copy_material_ids
param.label: copy material ids
param.help: Copy the existing material distribution of the layer which is to be extended. If the switch isn't given a new material id will be created.

param.name: set_material_id
param.label: set material id
param.help: the material id of the new layer

tool.help: This tool runs the **AddLayer** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
